name: Atl & Ollin
description:
Download the game and have play through it with a friend using Xbox controllors (no keyboard support sorry).

This game was designed to invoke the feelings of trust in the players. It was derived from 3 prompts that influenced the way the game looked, sounded and played out.

Team:

Savik Fraguela (design)

Tim Volp (programming)

Richard Stein (programming)

Andrew Wilson (audio)

Timothy Goode (graphic design)

Cameron Brown (graphic design)
